update
set SALEBILL_ID=#{SALEBILL_ID}, GOODCODE_ID=#{GOODCODE_ID}, WAREHOUSE_ID=#{WAREHOUSE_ID}, PNUMBER=#{PNUMBER}, UNITPRICE_ID=#{UNITPRICE_ID}, AMOUNT=#{AMOUNT}, APPBILLNO=#{APPBILLNO}, ISFREE=#{ISFREE}, NOTE=#{NOTE}, BARCODE=#{BARCODE}, SETTEDNUMANDID=#{SETTEDNUMANDID}, PK_SOBOOKS=#{PK_SOBOOKS}, DEF1=#{DEF1}, DEF2=#{DEF2}, DEF3=#{DEF3}, DEF4=#{DEF4}, DEF5=#{DEF5}, CREATETIME=#{CREATETIME}, LASTTIME=#{LASTTIME}, DR=#{DR} where PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and FGROUP_ID=#{FGROUP_ID} and IFNULL(dr,0)=0
mapper.select: select a.FGROUP_ID, a.SALEBILL_ID, a.GOODCODE_ID, a.WAREHOUSE_ID, a.PNUMBER, a.UNITPRICE_ID, a.AMOUNT, a.APPBILLNO, a.ISFREE, a.NOTE, a.BARCODE, b.GOODNAME, d.WHNAME, c.NAME from a left join base_good b on a.GOODCODE_ID = b.GOODCODE left join cp_spunit c on b.CUNIT_ID = c.SPUNIT_ID left join base_warehouse d on a.WAREHOUSE_ID = d.WAREHOUSE_ID where a.SALEBILL_ID = #{SALEBILL_ID} and a.PK_SOBOOKS = #{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0
